text.content: Overall interaction framework design for Light;

text.content: Exploration and design of team management scenarios and personal productivity scenarios.

rich_text.plain_text: Exploration and design of team management scenarios and personal productivity scenarios.

text.content: Introduction

rich_text.plain_text: Introduction

text.content: "Light is a one-stop solution to collaborate on your team's knowledge, projects, and data. We offer Tasks, Projects, Notes, Wiki, Files, Spreadsheets, and Databases. We will tightly integrate personal productivity (to-dos and notes) with team collaboration."

rich_text.plain_text: "Light is a one-stop solution to collaborate on your team's knowledge, projects, and data. We offer Tasks, Projects, Notes, Wiki, Files, Spreadsheets, and Databases. We will tightly integrate personal productivity (to-dos and notes) with team collaboration."

text.content: With the advent of the cloud-native era, the productivity tool landscape has undergone a tremendous transformation. Currently, the global productivity market is in a fragmented state, with traditional PC-era tools and new cloud-native tools each occupying their own corners of the market, forcing customers to purchase multiple systems at increased cost.

rich_text.plain_text: With the advent of the cloud-native era, the productivity tool landscape has undergone a tremendous transformation. Currently, the global productivity market is in a fragmented state, with traditional PC-era tools and new cloud-native tools each occupying their own corners of the market, forcing customers to purchase multiple systems at increased cost.

text.content: Each user exhausts themselves shuttling between different tools, while the disconnected data and experience disparities create considerable friction, wasting time that could otherwise be spent creating value.

rich_text.plain_text: Each user exhausts themselves shuttling between different tools, while the disconnected data and experience disparities create considerable friction, wasting time that could otherwise be spent creating value.

text.content: Light is an overseas innovation project by Shimo Docs. We aim to create a truly worker-oriented collaborative office product that gives each individual the best work experience in a simple, calm, and non-disruptive atmosphere to complete work tasks.

rich_text.plain_text: Light is an overseas innovation project by Shimo Docs. We aim to create a truly worker-oriented collaborative office product that gives each individual the best work experience in a simple, calm, and non-disruptive atmosphere to complete work tasks.

text.content: Explorations

rich_text.plain_text: Explorations

text.content: Thinking

rich_text.plain_text: Thinking

text.content: Light aims to help teams with content collaboration, project management and execution, including both internal and external collaboration.

rich_text.plain_text: Light aims to help teams with content collaboration, project management and execution, including both internal and external collaboration.

text.content: To make the product more flexible, powerful, and conceptually simpler and consistent to meet and expand more scenarios, we chose Wiki as the information organization structure to support knowledge management and various information collaboration scenarios. We use an Airtable-like database format to satisfy all kinds of data and project management scenarios from small to large, gradually integrating various common collaboration tools to achieve more efficient and automated data flow.

rich_text.plain_text: To make the product more flexible, powerful, and conceptually simpler and consistent to meet and expand more scenarios, we chose Wiki as the information organization structure to support knowledge management and various information collaboration scenarios. We use an Airtable-like database format to satisfy all kinds of data and project management scenarios from small to large, gradually integrating various common collaboration tools to achieve more efficient and automated data flow.

text.content: Light = (Powerful project management + Flexible Wiki + Smart spreadsheets + Cloud office) / (Complexity/Messiness + Price), primarily serving individuals and small to medium-sized teams.

rich_text.plain_text: Light = (Powerful project management + Flexible Wiki + Smart spreadsheets + Cloud office) / (Complexity/Messiness + Price), primarily serving individuals and small to medium-sized teams.

rich_text.plain_text: Provide a clean, organized sense of focus in interaction and visual design, without clutter or anxiety.

text.content: Embrace the Maker

rich_text.plain_text: Embrace the Maker

text.content: Enable users to create elegant, personalized "personal products" that solve complex business problems:

rich_text.plain_text: Enable users to create elegant, personalized "personal products" that solve complex business problems:

rich_text.plain_text: Data Structuring and Connectivity

text.content: Achieve extensive connectivity of data inside and outside the organization, making Light the center of collaborative office data:

rich_text.plain_text: Achieve extensive connectivity of data inside and outside the organization, making Light the center of collaborative office data:

text.content: Strengthen linkages between various types of files for convenient data flow;

rich_text.plain_text: Strengthen linkages between various types of files for convenient data flow;

text.content: Product Concepts

rich_text.plain_text: Product Concepts

text.content: We built the product starting with software development teams as our initial target customers, with common scenarios including team Wiki, software project management, PRDs, meetings, etc.

rich_text.plain_text: We built the product starting with software development teams as our initial target customers, with common scenarios including team Wiki, software project management, PRDs, meetings, etc.

text.content: 🗺️ Team

rich_text.plain_text: 🗺️ Team

text.content: Team: Corresponds to the collaborative group, where team managers can invite, add members, and manage permissions;

rich_text.plain_text: Team: Corresponds to the collaborative group, where team managers can invite, add members, and manage permissions;

text.content: ⛳️ Project

rich_text.plain_text: ⛳️ Project

text.content: Space: Each Team can have multiple Spaces as collaboration areas for different scenarios, which can be used for project management, knowledge base building, etc. through wiki, doc, database, and other forms;

rich_text.plain_text: Space: Each Team can have multiple Spaces as collaboration areas for different scenarios, which can be used for project management, knowledge base building, etc. through wiki, doc, database, and other forms;

text.content: 👩🏻‍💻 Individual

rich_text.plain_text: 👩🏻‍💻 Individual

text.content: To enhance the work experience and efficiency of each person in the team, we provide these cross-team, individual-centered tools:

rich_text.plain_text: To enhance the work experience and efficiency of each person in the team, we provide these cross-team, individual-centered tools:

text.content: Task: Focus on completing my tasks across various teams or projects and manage tasks from others that I'm following;

rich_text.plain_text: Task: Focus on completing my tasks across various teams or projects and manage tasks from others that I'm following;

text.content: Notifications: Stay up-to-date with important updates and communication progress that I need to pay attention to;

rich_text.plain_text: Notifications: Stay up-to-date with important updates and communication progress that I need to pay attention to;

text.content: Search: Quickly find needed information across the entire Light platform;

rich_text.plain_text: Search: Quickly find needed information across the entire Light platform;

text.content: Quick add: Quickly record tasks I want to complete or ideas worth noting without leaving my current location;

rich_text.plain_text: Quick add: Quickly record tasks I want to complete or ideas worth noting without leaving my current location;

rich_text.plain_text: Wiki as Information Organization Format

text.content: Doc, Database, PPT, and More Formats

rich_text.plain_text: Doc, Database, PPT, and More Formats

text.content: Use Doc for output creation and knowledge management, Database for project and data management, PPT for proposal presentations, and insert more third-party plugins to meet additional scenarios.

rich_text.plain_text: Use Doc for output creation and knowledge management, Database for project and data management, PPT for proposal presentations, and insert more third-party plugins to meet additional scenarios.

text.content: 3. Simple and Focused Personal Workflow

rich_text.plain_text: 3. Simple and Focused Personal Workflow

text.content: 3.1 Task

rich_text.plain_text: 3.1 Task

text.content: View, complete, and manage all tasks related to you in one place, without having your focused state disrupted by switching between pages; tasks are grouped by time, with default focus on what needs to be completed today, avoiding distraction from excessive noise

rich_text.plain_text: View, complete, and manage all tasks related to you in one place, without having your focused state disrupted by switching between pages; tasks are grouped by time, with default focus on what needs to be completed today, avoiding distraction from excessive noise

text.content: When creating tasks, quickly complete settings through buttons for assignee and date, or use keyboard shortcuts

rich_text.plain_text: When creating tasks, quickly complete settings through buttons for assignee and date, or use keyboard shortcuts

text.content: When switching task status, it will automatically synchronize with people following the task

rich_text.plain_text: When switching task status, it will automatically synchronize with people following the task

text.content: Easily access task details and project context with one click

rich_text.plain_text: Easily access task details and project context with one click

text.content: While lists are suitable for planning and organizing tasks, helping users clarify "what to do" and "when to do it," kanban is more focused on tracking task status and progress

rich_text.plain_text: While lists are suitable for planning and organizing tasks, helping users clarify "what to do" and "when to do it," kanban is more focused on tracking task status and progress

text.content: Open "Assigned by me" to quickly understand the progress of tasks you've assigned to others

rich_text.plain_text: Open "Assigned by me" to quickly understand the progress of tasks you've assigned to others

text.content: Results

rich_text.plain_text: Results

text.content: After launching internally, Light became a valuable assistant in our work. We shared it with several overseas teams for free trials and received many positive reviews, suggestions, and expectations. Some teams even abandoned their old team collaboration tools in favor of Light, migrating their work platforms to it.

rich_text.plain_text: After launching internally, Light became a valuable assistant in our work. We shared it with several overseas teams for free trials and received many positive reviews, suggestions, and expectations. Some teams even abandoned their old team collaboration tools in favor of Light, migrating their work platforms to it.

text.content: After continuously collecting feedback and making updates and refinements, we officially launched Light on Product Hunt.

rich_text.plain_text: After continuously collecting feedback and making updates and refinements, we officially launched Light on Product Hunt.
